prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Piano, Organ, Guitar, Drums, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Piano, Organ, Guitar, Drums - no Bass - make up this song.

Style 2: This composition features Reed, Piano, Organ, Guitar, Drums, but Bass is absent.

Style 3: This piece is comprised of Reed, Piano, Organ, Guitar, Drums, yet Bass is not included.
